description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Analytics' that renders an analytics dashboard page. It handles state for fetching and displaying summaries and timeseries data related to invoice analytics, with user controls to filter the data. The component interacts with external API services, manages loading and error states, and composes several child components for visualization.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Function to trigger data fetching for summary and timeseries, updating the component's state accordingly.
